precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop background.
action: Right Click the desktop and then Click the menu item 'Properties'.

precondition: The right-click context menu on the desktop is visible.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the "Display Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Appearance" tab is currently active.
expected_results: The "Themes" tab will become the active, selected tab in the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is visible.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will be selected, and the screen saver settings will be displayed.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click on the down arrow of the "Screen saver" drop-down menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" drop-down menu will expand to show a list of available screen savers.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab within the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "3D Text" option in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "3D Text" option will be selected in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Apply" button is enabled.
expected_results: The changes made in the "Display Properties" will be applied.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Power..." button is visible at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open, displaying a list of time intervals.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" setting will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "OK" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu displays "(None)".
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.
